Description:
Model
Brand: NEXIN
Model: NEX-DS1U3


Details
Color: Black
Size: 2.5" & 3.5"
Type: Docking Station
AC Adapter: Yes
Internal Interface: SATA I/II/III
External Interface: USB 3.0
Number of Bay: 1
Specifications: NEXIN NEX-DS1U3 2.5inch / 3.5inch SATA Hard Drive USB 3.0 Docking Station is designed with a simple and compact idea which offers an easy and convenient way for data backup and recovery, hard drive testing, and fast access to archived hard drives.


Features
Features: RoHS Compliance 
Supports 2.5" & 3.5" SATA Hard Drives up to 8TB hard drive 
Hot-Swap Capable 
Power & HDD Activity LEDs 
Supports USB 3.0 interface Transfer rate up to 5Gbps 
Windows OS, Mac OS, and Linux Compatible


Package Contents
Package Contents: NEXIN USB 3.0 Docking Station
Certifed USB 3.0 Cable (3ft)
AC/DC Power Adapter
Label: Docking NEXIN 1xBay NEX-DS1U3
